title: Black screen after champion select .
body: Hello to all . So first of all i have this problem since yesterday . After champion select my screen goes black. There is no loading screen , nothing . Just a black screen and i can hear when the match is starting because of the sound . Can someone please help me ? Does anyone has the same issue ?

replies.body: If you are able to hear everything in-game but have a black screen, then you were able to establish a connection to the game server but a driver or hardware issue failed to render.  I recommend going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to tune up your PC and get this fixed up.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
